name: Analyst1
description: Analyst1 is a threat intelligence platform

options.name: Analyst1 API URL
options.description: The base URL for the Analyst1 API to include the schema (https://) and port as needed.  This option should be set to "Lock and show option for all users".

options.name: Password
options.description: Valid Analyst1 Password for the given email address

options.name: Verified Indicators Only
options.description: If checked, the integration will only return verified indicators.  If this option is a per-user setting, the integration cache should be set to per user.

options.name: Enable Evidence Submission
options.description: If checked, the integration will allow users to submit text based evidence directly from the Overlay Window. This option should be set to "Lock and show option for all users".

options.name: Default Evidence TLP
options.description: The default TLP level for submitted evidence. This option should be set to "Lock and show option for all users".

options.name: Evidence Source Id
options.description: The numeric source identifier to be associated with submitted evidence.  We recommend creating a Polarity specific source under "Admin Controls" -> "Manage Sources". If left blank the Evidence Source with be set to unknown.
